title: Supreme Court & Corporate Tyranny
description: Fellas discuss the impact of Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas before welcoming Michael Pack and Mark Paoletta for a conversation about their upcoming documentary about his life. Olympic athlete and business executive Jennifer Sey joins the progrum for a conversation about standing up to corporations.
author: hello@ruthlesspodcast.com (Jennifer Sey, Michael Pack, Mark Paoletta, Josh Holmes, Comfortably Smug, John Ashbrook)
